reviews.review: Эта игра - шедевр, даже для 2022 года!
神作！但是玩多了有点头晕
Herkesin alıp oynaması gereken bir klasik
很好玩，很上头，一打开就会玩很久，就算卡关了也不会放弃
合作游戏特别好玩，很适合和朋友玩
вот отвечаю игра стоит своих денег просто топ
This is the part where he kills you
销量榜第一是有原因的，神作就是神作，甚至比半条命好玩，一代本身就是赠品不多说，二代的机制是那么的完善且有趣，玩它简直是一种享受，你会有种的佩服它的玩法。而且，在如此新颖有趣的玩法下，传送门2还在讲故事，剧情是真的牛逼，从加入新元素到剧情的转折，从开始到结束，代入感极强，七个小时的时间转瞬即逝，但却让人意犹未尽。不论是主体还是细节，传送门2都是绝对的神作，趁着夏促赶快买吧，真的物超所值！
the only game I'd consider perfect
关卡设计很有意思，两个人玩很不错

One of the best campaigns of all time. One of the most unique gameplay experiences of all time. If you like the puzzles, there are literally hundreds of thousands of user made maps to play. It's my all-time favorite.

Great game, good puzzle game and story line. Sometimes you can get stuck, but overall I would highly recommend.

I don't care what you do with your time and money... so long as portal is involved. Honestly, you can skip portal 1 and not really miss anything. It's a bit like skipping the preface in a book but still starting from the first chapter. After playing through the first chapter you'll understand the scene, plot, and situation. I won't spoil anything, but I can say that this game never gets old. It involves a bunch of puzzles but has a somewhat comedic and somewhat eerie, dystopian twist. Enough of each to have fun while keeping you on your reinforced toes. Besides, it's on sale. You can get both games in a bundle for like a dollar. That's 20+ hours worth of campaign enjoyment(if you're not some speed runner that hates life and plot). I don't know why I'm still rambling. It doesn't take much to become engrossed in the falling apart future.
Very fun. Lots of replay value with community maps.

a very good story that is a great sequel. challenging puzzles that are very enjoyable. really encourage a blind play-through for best experience

G胖确实有才，解谜妙趣十足，双人联机体验也很好。
说句题外话，作为10年前的双人联机游戏，联机途中没有任何问题，游戏也能正常打开，就值得一个好评。

Wunderbares Spiel mit viel Liebe zum Detail in dem man problemlos mehrere Stunden verbringen kann. Und neben der Story gibt es sogar noch einen grandiosen Multiplayer. Ein richtig schönes Rätselspiel!
The story was engaging, funny and had creative twists and turns. The voice acting is top tier and the test chambers were a blast to solve. Highly recommend to anyone!

Aklınızın alamayacağı bir bulmaca oyunu hem grafikleri süper hem de oynanışı.Üstelik bir arkadaşla 2 kişilik modda oynayabilirsiniz gerçekten 2 kişilik çok zevkli. Ayrıca bölümler beyin yakıcı o yüzden tam bir bulmaca performansı tattırıyor.
